Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: Surprisingly large and bright in aesthetic, this study features seafoam green-colored walls accented with subtle swirling patterns of pale bronze. The dark wood tones of the cantilevered ceiling overhead ground the space alongside the terra cotta-colored wood of the floor. Ivory area rugs stand at the center of two matching seating areas of light gold upholstery. Windows in the eastern and northern walls both provide views of the outside, their massive size dressed in swathes of dusty blue drapery. Sitting opposite and in between the dual seating areas is a larger than average spalted maple desk outfitted with a cornflower upholstered armchair of equally impressive size.

The dark wood tones of the cantilevered ceiling overhead ground the space alongside the terra cotta-colored wood of the floor. Ivory area rugs stand at the center of two matching seating areas of light gold upholstery. an arched double door leading northwest

Each side of the arched double door leading to the northwest is divided into six raised panels of equal height and width, topped with a stationary seventh semicircular panel at the apex which spans the full width of the doorway. Painted a flawless porcelain white, each panel is decorated with an intricate raised floral engraving accented with gold leaf. $(parent-desc)
an arched double door leading southeast

Each side of the arched double door leading to the southeast is divided into six raised panels of equal height and width, topped with a stationary seventh semicircular panel at the apex which spans the full width of the doorway. Painted a flawless porcelain white, each panel is decorated with an intricate raised floral engraving accented with gold leaf. $(parent-desc)
